products.name: Men's Classic T-Shirt
products.short_description: A comfortable and stylish t-shirt for men.
products.long_description: This classic t-shirt is made from high-quality cotton, providing both comfort and durability. It's perfect for casual wear and can be paired with jeans or shorts.

products.name: Women's Slim Fit Jeans
products.short_description: Slim fit jeans designed for women.
products.long_description: These slim fit jeans are tailored to flatter your figure while offering flexibility and comfort. They feature a modern design with multiple pockets and a zip fly closure.

products.name: Unisex Hooded Sweatshirt
products.short_description: A cozy hooded sweatshirt for everyone.
products.long_description: Stay warm and stylish with this unisex hooded sweatshirt. It's made from a soft blend of cotton and polyester, and it features a front pouch pocket and an adjustable drawstring hood.

products.name: Women's Casual Dress
products.short_description: A versatile and elegant dress for women.
products.long_description: This casual dress is suitable for various occasions, from daytime outings to evening events. It features a flattering design, comfortable fabric, and is available in different colors.

products.name: Men's Sports Jacket
products.short_description: A high-performance sports jacket for men.
products.long_description: Stay active and stylish with this sports jacket. It's designed for outdoor activities, featuring moisture-wicking fabric, multiple pockets, and a zip-front closure.

products.name: Women's Running Shoes
products.short_description: Comfortable and supportive running shoes for women.
products.long_description: These running shoes are engineered for performance and comfort. They provide excellent cushioning, support, and breathability, making them ideal for workouts and running.

products.name: Men's Cargo Shorts
products.short_description: Functional and stylish cargo shorts for men.
products.long_description: These cargo shorts offer both style and utility with multiple pockets for storage. They're perfect for outdoor adventures and casual outings.

products.name: Women's Yoga Leggings
products.short_description: Stretchy and comfortable yoga leggings for women.
products.long_description: Elevate your yoga practice with these comfortable leggings. They provide excellent flexibility and support, allowing you to move freely during workouts.

products.name: Men's Formal Suit
products.short_description: A classic formal suit for men.
products.long_description: Look sharp and sophisticated in this formal suit. It's suitable for weddings, business meetings, and other formal occasions, featuring a tailored fit and timeless design.

products.name: Women's Leather Handbag
products.short_description: A stylish leather handbag for women.
products.long_description: Complete your ensemble with this elegant leather handbag. It's spacious, well
